segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, missing the overflow at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pooling on the floor, and she stands right in it, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks unsteady; the boy could tumble and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up expectantly, but this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how the calm garden outside contrasts with the indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes like it's any normal day, unaware of the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, potentially causing slips and damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the family; mischief like this often leads to regret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets and stacked dishes add to the vulnerability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one sees the dangers building up in this routine moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me melancholy, wishing I could warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
